title: Did Rush Limbaugh Downplay COVID as ‘the Common Cold’?
subtitle: On one show in March 2020, Limbaugh also falsely claimed that news organizations weren't reporting the then-low number of deaths because it would make Trump look good.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: Rush Limbaugh said in February 2020: "Yeah, I'm dead right on this. The coronavirus is the common cold, folks."
